statements: UPDATE account_balance_monitoring SET account_balance = 1000.50, last_activity_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE account_balance_monitoring SET last_activity_date = '2022-02-25', account_balance = 1500.75 WHERE customer_id = '456e89b3-12d3-a456-4266-14174000';
UPDATE account_balance_monitoring SET account_balance = account_balance + 100.50 WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE account_balance_monitoring SET last_activity_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE customer_id = '523e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Accounts SET balance = 1500 WHERE account_id = 100
UPDATE Alerts SET alert_message = 'Low Balance Alert' WHERE account_id = 200
UPDATE Accounts SET balance = balance + 500.50 WHERE account_id = 1234
UPDATE Alerts SET alert_message = 'Overdraft Alert: Balance below $100' WHERE account_id = 5678
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = 1500.75, last_activity = '2022-06-01 09:30:00' WHERE account_id = 100
UPDATE customer_alerts SET alert_message = 'Suspicious Activity Detected', alert_timestamp = '2022-05-31 14:45:00' WHERE alert_id = 1
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = 2000.50 WHERE account_id = 101
UPDATE customer_alerts SET alert_timestamp = '2022-03-15 09:30:00' WHERE alert_id = 201
UPDATE AccountBalances SET balance = 500.00, last_updated = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE account_id = 1001
UPDATE Alerts SET alert_type = 'Critical', alert_timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:45:00' WHERE alert_id = 2001
UPDATE AccountBalances SET balance = balance + 500 WHERE account_id = 1234;
UPDATE Transactions SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount * 1.05, transaction_type = 'Credit' WHERE account_id = 5678 AND transaction_type = 'Debit';
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = 5000.75, last_updated = '2022-11-30 09:30:00' WHERE account_id = 12345
UPDATE customer_alerts SET alert_message = 'Suspicious activity detected!', timestamp = NOW(), alert_type = 'High Risk' WHERE alert_id = 56789
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = 1500.75, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE customer_accounts SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE account_id = 56789;
